alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 02 at 12:19AM AKDT until May 02 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 6 PM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another band of snow, blowing snow and winds is expected to move over the Bering Strait and St Lawrence Island Tuesday morning and cause periods of low visibility. The snow and blowing snow is expected to to continue into Tue evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
